entry.tran: 比赛战术；比赛策略；制胜手段
entry.def: Gamesmanship is the art or practice of winning a game by clever methods which are not against the rules but are very close to cheating.

example.ex: ...a remarkably successful piece of diplomatic gamesmanship.

means.word_mean: 1. the use of dubious (although not technically illegal) methods to win a game
